text: Guernsey County Ohio Land for Sale 6 Acres in Guernsey County - Ideal for Your Mini Farm or Getaway! Located between Salt Fork and Piedmont Lake State Parks and just minutes from I-70, this 6 +/-acre property in Guernsey County offers the perfect blend of rural charm and convenience. Whether you're looking to build a home or cabin, start a mini farm, or park your camper for a weekend retreat, this land provides a versatile opportunity. The property features gently rolling terrain with a mix of open pasture and wooded at the rear, plus a well-established electric connection and a water well on the land. A 24x40 three-car pole barn with a metal roof and siding adds extra storage and functionality. Situated on a quiet gravel road, this property ensures rural life while remaining accessible. The pasture is currently fenced for horses, and multiple building sites offer excellent possibilities for development. This land is a fantastic investment opportunity in a sought-after recreational area of Ohio. This property is perfectly positioned for outdoor enthusiasts, with several top recreation spots just a short drive away. Salt Fork State Park, Ohio's largest state park, is only 12 miles northwest, offering boating, hiking, fishing, and camping. Wolf Run State Park, just 10 miles west, features scenic trails and a peaceful lake for relaxation. For water lovers, Piedmont Lake 15 miles east is a hidden gem known for its excellent fishing and quiet natural beauty, while Seneca Lake 12 miles south is a popular spot for boating. Despite its peaceful setting, the property offers excellent accessibility, located less than 2 miles from U.S. Route 70, a major east-west highway that makes travel easy. Cambridge is just 16 miles northwest, while Columbus OH is about 1 hour 40-minutes, Pittsburgh PA is a 1 hour 45-minute drive, and Cleveland is a 2-hour drive, all within convenient reach. Whether you're looking for a weekend getaway, a permanent home, or a recreational retreat, this location offers the perfect balance of rural and connectivity. Ohio Land for Sale Details: - On a gravel township road. - 241'+/- of road frontage. - Mostly open pasture field with some timber at the back of the property. - The neighbor (owner's relative) currently has the pasture temporarily fenced in for horses. - Topography is gently rolling to flat. - Great building site options. - Electric is established on site. - Water Well on the property, not hooked up to the garage. - 3 car pole barn garage 24x40 metal roof/siding, gravel floor, Built 2014. - Located in Oxford Township. - East Guernsey Local School District. - Mineral Rights previously reserved. - GPS Coordinates: 40.0727, -81.3296 - Guernsey County Parcel numbers: 28-0000805.024 - Legal Description: R7 T10 SS33-01 LOT 24 BAPTIST ROAD - Real estate taxes are approximately $805 per year. - Showings by appointment to pre-qualified buyers only. - All information and maps are deemed reliable but not guaranteed.
